snippet: Leicester City, the surprise winner of the Premier League, received a grueling education on how the European tournament operates months before its start....
abstract: Leicester City has spent time since its unexpected Premier League title preparing its stadium and players for club's entry into UEFA Champions League; UEFA has very strict requirements for teams that make league, something Leicester City has very little experience with.
lead_paragraph: Leicester City, the surprise winner of the Premier League, received a grueling education on how the European tournament operates months before its start.

headline.main: From Mowing to Mascots: Playing by the Champions League’s Rules
headline.print_headline: Welcome to the Party. Now Do Your Homework.
